error.message: Call to deprecated function db_query_range(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call queryRange() on it. For example,

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\search_api_stats_block\Plugin\Derivative\SearchApiStatsBlock::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to search_api_stats.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
